Description:
Group Configuration resource.  This resource is used to
   query/manage the group membership of a CoAP server.
HTTP to CoAP mapping base resource.
Air Conditioner device
Air Purifier device
Blind device
Camera device
Dishwasher device
Door device
Dryer device
Fan device
Garage Door device
Light device
Printer Multi-Function device
Oven device
Printer device
Receiver device
Refrigerator device
Robot Cleaner device
Scanner device
Security Panel device
Generic Sensor device
Smart Lock device
Smart Plug device
Switch device
Thermostat device
Television device
Washer device.  This is a clothes washer device.
Water Valve device
Air Flow resource.  This resource describes the properties associated with air flow.
Air Flow Control resource. This resource describes the attributes associated with control of air flow, for example as modelled by a Thermostat (fan), Room A/C or other device.
Altimeter resource. This resource describes properties associated with the height of the position.
Audio Controls resource. This resource defines basic audio control functions.
Auto Focus resource. This resource describes whether an auto focus feature is on or off.
Automatic Document Feeder resource. This resource describes the state of an automatic document feeder, typically used with a scanner.
Button Switch resource. This resource describes the operation of a button style switch.
Clock resource. This resource describes the properties associated with clock and time.
Auto White Balance resource. This resource describes whether an auto balance feature is on or off.
Colour Chroma resource. This resource describes the colour using chroma conventions.
Colour RGB resource. This resource specifies the actual colour in the RGB space.
Colour Saturation resource. This resource describes a Colour saturation value.
Door resource. This resource describes the open state of a door.
Battery resource.  This resource represents the charge state of a battery.
Energy Consumption resource. This resource describes the energy consumed by the device since power up  and the instantaneous power draw of the device at the time the resource was queried.
Demand Response Load Control (DRLC) resource. This resource describes any to be applied or currently being applied DRLC signal.
Energy Overload/Circuit Breaker resource. This resource describes whether an energy overload detector/circuit breaker has been tripped.
Energy Usage resource. This resource describes a cumulative time-based energy usage query.
Height resource. This resource describes the properties associated with height of an object's physical size.
Humidity resource. This resource describes a sensed or desired humidity.
Ice Maker resource. This resource describes the operational state of an ice maker.
Brightness resource. This resource describes the brightness of a light or lamp.
Dimming resource. This resource describes a dimming function.
Ramp Time resource. This resource describes the Ramp Time of a dimming function.
Lock Code resource. This resource describes a lock code.
Lock resource. This resource describes whether a lock is locked or unlocked.
Media resource. This resource specifies the media that a server supports.
Media Source Input resource.  This resource provides the list of input media sources available on the device.
Media Source Output resource. This resource provides the list of output media sources available on the device.
Mode resource. This resource describes the modes of operation that a device can provide.
Movement resource. This resource describes linear movement.
Night Mode resource. This resource describes whether a night mode feature is on or off.
Open Level resource. This resource describes how open or ajar an entity such as a window, door, blind or shutter is.
Operational State resource. This resource describes the operational and job states on a device.
Pan Tilt Zoom Movement resource. This resource specifies the pan tilt and zoom capabilities of a device.
Refrigeration resource. This resource describes a refrigeration function.
Generic Sensor resource. This resource describes whether some value or property or entity has been sensed or not.
Acceleration Sensor resource. This resource provides a measure of proper acceleration (g force).
Activity Count resource. This resource specifies an activity count.
Atmospheric Pressure resource. This resource provides a measurement of Mean Sea Level Pressure experienced at the measuring point expressed in millibars.
Carbon Dioxide Sensor resource. This resource describes whether carbon dioxide has been sensed or not.
Carbon Monoxide Sensor resource. This resource describes whether carbon monoxide has been sensed or not.
Contact Sensor resource. This resource describes whether a contact sensor has been tripped or not.
Geolocation Sensor resource. This resource describes the properties associated with the current geolocation coordinate.
Glass Break Sensor resource. This resource describes a glass break sensor.
Heart Rate Zone Sensor resource. This resource describes a measured heart rate by the current Zone using the Zoladz method.
Illuminance Sensor resource. This resource describes an illuminance sensor.
Magnetic Field Direction resource. This resource describes the direction of the Earth's magnetic field at the observer's current point in space.
Motion Sensor resource. This resource describes whether motion has been sensed or not.
Presence Sensor resource. This resource describes whether presence has been sensed or not.
UV Radiation resource. This resource describes an ultraviolet radiation measurement.
Sleep Sensor resource. This resource describes whether human sleep has been sensed or not.
Smoke Sensor resource. This resource describes whether smoke has been sensed or not.
Three Axis Sensor resource. This resource provides a representation of the measurement from a three-axis sensor.
Touch Sensor resource. This resource describes whether touch has been sensed or not.
Water Sensor resource. This resource describes whether water has been sensed or not.
Signal Strength resource. This resource describes the strength of a signal by means of Link Quality Indicator and Received Signal Strength Indicator.
Speech Synthesis resource. This resource is capable of rendering speech and allows a client to provide an SSML document with text to render.
Binary switch resource.  This resource describes a binary switch (on/off).
Temperature resource. This resource describes a sensed or actuated Temperature value.
Time Period resource. This resource describes the time period over which any additionally provided information is derived or bounded.
Weight resource. This resource describes the properties associated with weight of an object.
